website_summaries.verdict: Instead of a one-size snorkel vest, this version offers four sizes for a customized fit to create a more relaxed and comfortable dive experience.
pros: Sizes from junior up to XL, with most reporting the vest fits as expected
Tube is situated for easy inflation
Provides plenty of buoyancy and doesn't leak
Even those who aren't strong swimmers report feeling more secure wearing the vest
cons: Multiple users don't like how the crotch strap fits, feeling it could be longer
Others state that the waist strap will not fit larger midsections

customer_reviews.title: Makes snorkeling easy for poor swimers
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my girlfriend who can't swim very well for snorkeling in Hawaii. She tried to go out without it, but she panicked when water got in her goggles and I had to hold her and take her back in. With the vest on she was much more comfortable. She could adjust her googles or snorkel with the vest on and didn't panic with it on. The vest also made it easier for me to spot her as we browsed the reefs and got a little separated. It's much easier to pack than a life jacket and you can adjust the amount of air in it so you could have more or less buoyancy to your liking.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Chan

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for a large man
customer_reviews.text: This Adult XL fits my husband perfect and a great price. He is a 2XL and most of this type vest’s safe weight were way too low. He got this to use while snorkeling on an upcoming cruise and its perfect because it folds so compact but also is very easy to inflate and deflate. I will update if it really underperforms in the water but I think it’s going to be excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my son to snorkel in the deeper waters with us!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 year old son to wear when we snorkel. Sometimes I forget how deep we are getting and he can’t touch, I felt like this would put me at ease while snorkeling with him. Worked great, fit perfectly! Very easy to inflate and deflate forceasu storage in my beach bag! While we were on vacation I saw the exact same snorkel vest in a bait shop, I paid $17 for his, they were selling it for $65. So definetly worth getting on amazon before you go on vaca!! My son is 10 years old, 85 lbs and I ordered an adult M.
customer_reviews.author: Chews#2

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed with this vest
customer_reviews.text: This vest led me into an awful experience. As soon as I was in the ocean, it rode up so high, it was literally in my mouth. I had to keep pushing it downward with my hand. Besides that, it kept pulling me backward so I was pulled into the current. My husband finally just took it off me. I bought the vest because I have very poor balance and need a safety vest to feel stable. This was definitely not it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dickens

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginning swimmers
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 9-year-old for a trip to Hawaii. It fit as expected (he's tall for his age, but lean). He hated it because it's hard to tip forward to snorkel when most of the air is in the chest part of the vest. Since he's a decent swimmer, a pool noodle would have been a better snorkeling floater for him. I got a junior one for my 6-year-old, and she wore it. The crotch strap pulled up wedgie-style and it was hard for her to push forward over the air hump to get her face in the water, but once she was in position, it worked well. After a while, they get annoying around your neck.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Adams

customer_reviews.title: Snorkels that leak!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these snorkel vests for our grand kids 8 and 9 years old. They were in sealed bags. We brought them on our Caribbean cruise on which we would be snorkeling four times with our 8 year old and 9 near old. When we went to use them one of them had a leak so one of the children could not snorkel on the beach! We were very upset to say the least. Obviously the department that was supposed to check our purchase did not check it as this leak was instantaneous.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine

customer_reviews.title: SIZE RUNS VERY SMALL
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE - I ordered this in size large, as that was the largest size offered, for a snorkeling trip to the caribbean, and received it in a couple days before departure. I am 5'10" and 220 lbs, both the waist and crotch straps were several inches too short. subsequently I had to use a borrowed vest for the entire trip. Otherwise, the vest appears to be of normal quality material and would have been satisfied with purchase. I will have to return to Amazon and search for a more suitable vest.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: It worked wonderfully. It is easy to control the air level ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the vest to provide myself with more buoyancy while teaching my 8-year-old to skin dive (I got her a different model in her size). It worked wonderfully. It is easy to control the air level while in the water and it fit comfortably. It did have a tendency to ride up a bit while vertical in the water (for example while helping my child to get her fins on) but stayed put around my waist while swimming. The workmanship appears outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Johannsen

customer_reviews.title: Other than that once we figured out how to do it super easy and perfect
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfectly for our kids first snorkeling adventure in the bahamas. They were a little tricky to figure out how to blow them up you have to unscrew the top and then press in on it as you blow into the tube. To deflate you unscrew it and press in the top. Other than that once we figured out how to do it super easy and perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Pruitt

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.  We bought 2 and they both leaked air.
customer_reviews.text: WE bought 2 of these and they both leaked air. They are dangerous - do not trust these with your child in them. I bought them for a trip to Thailand with the Grandchildren. Luckily I bought some other brands that did not leak and were able to rotate them around.
customer_reviews.author: Psych

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our kids to wear during snorkeling in Belize. We bought them for our six and ten year old. The kids hated them and did not wear them for long. Both kids said they were very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Massey

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Used this while snorkeling in the Carribean and it is my favorite thing I packed for the trip. Love love love the ease of use and compactness of this vest. Very convenient for travel and very secure when worn. The only thing I didn't love (the reason for 4 stars instead of 5) was the strap that goes between your legs...gave me a wedgie the whole time 😐
customer_reviews.author: holdthisforme

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase for snorkeling. Took with us on a cruise to Bermuda. Fit well. I am 5'7. 185 lbs. and spouse is 6'0" and 200 lbs. Fit us both well. I recommend. We had no problems with these vests. I bought two-different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our recent vacation to Costa Rica. We needed something small enough to fit in our luggage (we only took carry-ons) and these worked great! They are durable and fit well. I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: The Lucky One

customer_reviews.title: This product WORKS for NON-SWIMMERS!
customer_reviews.text: This product WORKS for NON-SWIMMERS! I got medium and it fit me 5'10" 160lb and my wife 5'4" 105lb. Highly recommend to anyone who can't swim or afraid of doing so, but wants to enjoy snorkeling. Also, this product is durable and compact, so it is easy to bring it in your carry-on baggage.
customer_reviews.author: Ihor M.

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: I works, but like most life jackets with straps, they tend to want to shift around a bit when you are swimming. Good size, didn't leak air when inflated. Pack nice and flat.
customer_reviews.author: disappointed reader

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and simple
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality product. Its easy to use nothing fancy about it but its well built. Folds up flat after using it so it doesnt take much space when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: We Love it for Sailing in the Philippines at PhilippinesSailingTours dot com
customer_reviews.text: We love these. Just used it tonight for a dinner at sea with friends at PhilippinesSailingTours dot com. My entire family has these and we love them for sailing and snorkeling. Add a little air so if you fall off the boat, you are at least floating immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Greg the American Expat in The Philippines

customer_reviews.title: Snorkel vest, own one instead of renting one.
customer_reviews.text: For the money very good, first thing I did was blow it up firmly to see if they would hold air overnight and they did. Construction looks solid but not fancy. Plastic buckles look fine. Im 6'2" 230# the XL fit just right. Like I said for the money its a good product.
customer_reviews.author: dead mice

customer_reviews.title: Loved the product and the added confidence it gave me!
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, good quality, used it several times in HI and im still alive. Not a good swimmer, so this gave me an added bit of confidence to snorkel off-shore.
customer_reviews.author: CarenR

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and packs easily
customer_reviews.text: Fit my large sized husband well. Packs easily and weighs almost nothing
customer_reviews.author: Angela Woollen

customer_reviews.title: This vest was very easy to use and did the job
customer_reviews.text: This vest was very easy to use and did the job. It is one of the few that are available in multiple sizes. The Large worked for the Male and Females in our group that were 5'10" and under and under 210 lbs. Get the XL if you are taller or heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Murray Bartholome

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: worked great. Lightweight, and packs easily. side belt is a little snug though and could be longer.
customer_reviews.author: DonB

customer_reviews.title: It’s a device you need to have on a boat
customer_reviews.text: It’s a device you need to have on a boat
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Works great in the ocean
customer_reviews.text: Works great in the ocean. Stayed in place. I can't swim at all but snorkel end in deep, rough water and never had an issue. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy2012

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Perfect fit. Took this with use on a cruise and did some snorkeling. Easy to pack.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for snorkling, can keep you afloat, while still feeling free
customer_reviews.text: Nice vest, easy to use, only the tube doesn’t look to strong. After snorkling for a whole, the crotch strap starts to irritate. We solved that with adding a soft fleece sleeve to it

customer_reviews.title: The straps rip quite easily and even though they advertise you can still snorkel ...
customer_reviews.text: The straps rip quite easily and even though they advertise you can still snorkel while vest is inflated, you really can't put much of your face in. Better to buy the ankle flotation devices.

customer_reviews.title: For twenty bucks you can't go wrong. I keep ...
customer_reviews.text: For twenty bucks you can't go wrong. I keep it in my old lady's vehicle just in case since I have two more similar to this one.

customer_reviews.title: Seems well-made but a little smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: It's fine and it works OK, but it's smaller than I anticipated. If I were to buy again I'd get one size up.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kids vest for swimmer and non swimmer
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than adult size yet performs just as good. Fits a 4 yr. old to give them confidence so they don't even think about staying afloat - just seeing the wonders in the water.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for snorkeling, just put a few puffs of air in it to stay near the surface.

customer_reviews.title: Good, lightweight and packable.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to inflate and works well for snorkeling. Now using for kayaking-better than bulky life jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Singer

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids to snorkel with at Maui
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for our trip.to Maui. The kids, both 8, we're able to use these to feel more comfortable snorkeling. Easy to pack and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: We used it in a camping trip recently and it ...
customer_reviews.text: We used it in a camping trip recently and it worked well. I'm planning on using it on my daughter when we go snorkeling in the keys in a few weeks.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for travel
customer_reviews.text: Brought it to Hawaii for snorkeling and it works great. No leaks, easy to blow up and flatten multiple times. Save room in the luggage and money from having to rent life vests.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Vest
customer_reviews.text: Loved this vest! I use everytime I go snorkeling, it is easy to fill with air and deflate to pack n go. I used to pack a flat noodle with my trips (ha ha), never again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yumi

customer_reviews.title: ... which surprises me as I have another vest just like this that has lasted and lasted and lasted
customer_reviews.text: the crotch strap came off - which surprises me as I have another vest just like this that has lasted and lasted and lasted. It didn't tear a hole in the vest, I just think it was not securely fastened.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Bought about 6 of these for snorkel trip. worked ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought about 6 of these for snorkel trip. worked as expected. cheap insurance vs getting in trouble while snorkeling.

customer_reviews.title: The item itself is awesome, good quality and functions well
customer_reviews.text: the vest tend to run a bit small. I am 5'9" and it does not fit me. The item itself is awesome, good quality and functions well. Just know that if you are a larger person this may not be the vest for you.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for safety jacket when on my boat by myself .

customer_reviews.title: Can Help Someone Overcome a Fear of Water
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend before our snorkeling trip to Bermuda. She has always had a crippling fear of water that's deeper than her (so, about 5 feet). This vest was easy to inflate, easy to deflate as needed, and fit just right. She was so comfortable, that she's no longer afraid of deep water as long as she has something like this.

customer_reviews.title: Safe in Tahiti
customer_reviews.text: The item preformed well both in a river and in the ocean. It is easily adjustable and affords the buoyancy needed for a safe experience. The larger size was a wise choice.

customer_reviews.title: A super choice for a snorkeling vest
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I each took one to Hawaii. Fit well, worked better.

customer_reviews.title: If you get this and you are not happy with it please be careful when you return it ...
customer_reviews.text: If you get this and you are not happy with it please be careful when you return it because I did and they said I didn't and took more money out of my account, from now on I will order only if I'm sure I can use it ,love the Vest but instructor said it was not right for the class
customer_reviews.author: sue1964

customer_reviews.title: They worked great for our 5 and 8 year old
customer_reviews.text: We packed these in our suitcase for a Caribbean trip. They worked great for our 5 and 8 year old. Would never trust these to keep them afloat by themselves, we still snorkel with them, but they were prefect to give them added endurance.

customer_reviews.title: Great for assisting a child while in the ocean.

It works well, adjusts easily, inflates quickly and can be inflated by a child. Deflating it should not happen by accident.

customer_reviews.title: Very Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This seemed like the perfect product for snorkeling but it turned out to be very uncomfortable. When the straps are adjusted so that it feels comfortable, the vest rides up in the neck and chokes you. When the straps are adjusted tight so that the vest can't ride up, it's very uncomfortable in the crotch. If there is some way to return this to the seller, I would like to return this item.

customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 and used them last week for snorkeling in Riviera Maya. Worked perfectly! Just secured them on and blew into the device. You can inflate and dis-inflate as you feel comfortable. Doesn't take up much space in luggage which is a plus!

customer_reviews.title: Worked Very Well in Hawaii
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well in Hawaii. Was snorkeling in water over my head by myself. I am 66 years old and weigh 240 pounds. I used to be a lifeguard in college but that was a long, long time ago. I probably didn't really need this as I was in safe places, but...why take the chance. I was very pleased.

customer_reviews.title: A snorkeling vest is a very good safety device
customer_reviews.text: A snorkeling vest is a very good safety device, especially if you snorkel in an area where unexpected currents might take you a long way from your departure point. The Promate inflatable vest allows you to inflate just enough to make the snorkeling easy while allowing you to dive deeper if you want. I used this vest for snorkeling at the edge of Simpson Bay in St. Maarten.
customer_reviews.author: Alan L. Bartlett

We tried a life vest instead and that worked perfectly for snorkeling...he could put his face down to look underwater but was also able to float and doggy paddle.

product_meta.title: Promate Snorkeling Jacket Vest
product_meta.description:
The Promate Snorkel Vests are designed to allow you to swim with your head in the water as opposed to life vests that are designed to keep your head out of water. They are inflatable so you can add or subtract air to meet the level of bouyancy needed by the wearer. This vest also offers an adjustable waist and crotch strap in order to secure the vest in place with maximum comfort. Available in Day-Glo yellow, the snorkel vest should be considered a necessary piece of your snorkeling equipment. 
Size information: XL for about 240~320 LBS. Large (lg.) for about 150~240 LBS. Medium (med.) for about 80~150 LBS. Small for less than 80 LBS.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :8.82 x 7.17 x 1.42 inches; 8.78 Ounces
 * Item model number :SV01
 * Department :Unisex-adult
 * Date First Available :July 19, 2016
 * Manufacturer :Promate
 * ASIN :B01FIUJK7A

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #107,382 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors)  *  #348 inLife Jackets & Vests 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.0 out of 5 stars185 ratings The Promate Snorkel Vests are designed to allow you to swim with your head in the water as opposed to life vests that are designed to keep your head out of water. They are inflatable so you can add or subtract air to meet the level of bouyancy needed by the wearer. This vest also offers an adjustable waist and crotch strap in order to secure the vest in place with maximum comfort. Available in Day-Glo yellow, the snorkel vest should be considered a necessary piece of your snorkeling equipment. 
Size information: XL for about 240~320 LBS. Large (lg.) for about 150~240 LBS. Medium (med.) for about 80~150 LBS. Small for less than 80 LBS.
feature_bullets: Inflatable vest provides extra buoyancy while snorkeling (26"x19" for about 240 to 320 lbs.)
Oral inflation tube allows quick inflation
Waist and crotch straps keep the vest secure
